name: Frequency Fighter
description:
Frequency Fighter is an arcade shooter where the player travels along the amplitude of a wave to hit and dodge enemies to a bumpin' soundtrack. Collect the coins to get points, watch out for the hazardous waves on the top and bottom of the screen, and survive to the end of the song to win!

Made for Global Game Jam 2017

A Game by Mike Baggott, Adam Rolph, Clayton Fortini, Corey Smith, Jose Flores, Julio Ibara, and Alex Patin. Special thanks to Mauricio Favery.
